target_markets.market_description: Creative professionals and designers using AI tools for visual content creation
pain_points: Relying too heavily on text prompts instead of visual references
Working in Discord instead of web interface
Not knowing advanced Midjourney features like style references
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Public library of generations suggests large active user base

problems_validated.problem: Users are stuck using basic text prompts instead of advanced visual-driven workflows
problems_validated.severity: High - users are missing out on 'infinite' aesthetic possibilities
problems_validated.current_solutions: Following Twitter prompt lists and basic text descriptions
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of education on advanced features like style space, character references, and visual-to-visual workflows

products_tools.name: Midjourney
products_tools.use_case: AI-powered visual content creation and design
products_tools.pricing: Standard plan (public generations) vs Pro plan (stealth mode for private generations)
products_tools.metrics: Large public library of user generations indicates significant user base

business_strategies.strategy: Transition from Discord-based workflow to web application for better user experience
business_strategies.implementation: Use midjourney.com web app instead of Discord interface
business_strategies.expected_results: Better workflow efficiency and user experience
business_strategies.case_study: Midjourney moved from Discord-only to web app availability

problems_solutions.problem: Over-reliance on text prompts limiting creative output
problems_solutions.solution: Use visual references and style space features instead of just text descriptions
steps: Start with visual inspiration from Pinterest/Reddit
Blend visual aesthetics rather than describing them
Use the create tab for generation

mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Inefficient workflow and poor user experience
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use the web application at midjourney.com instead
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Expert calls Discord 'a hellish place to be' for Midjourney work

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Relying only on text prompts and keyword combinations
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Limited aesthetic exploration and repetitive results
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use visual references, style space, and image-to-image workflows
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Moving from 'what does it do if I say this keyword' to visual canvas approach

growth_tactics.tactic: Create educational content showing advanced AI tool workflows
growth_tactics.results_expected: High engagement and repeat viewership based on comments

steps: Find visual inspiration from external sources
Use images as style references in Midjourney
Explore similar aesthetics using image search
Iterate using visual blending rather than text descriptions
ai_workflows.use_case: Creating consistent visual aesthetics and exploring infinite style variations

trends_signals.trend: Shift from text-based to visual-based AI prompting
trends_signals.opportunity: Education and tooling around visual-first AI workflows

trends_signals.trend: AI tools moving from Discord to dedicated web applications
trends_signals.opportunity: Better UX design for AI creative tools

actionable_quotes.quote: I think of mid journey as like a new medium entirely, right? Like it's a different type of canvas.
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the mindset shift needed for AI image generation
actionable_quotes.actionability: Approach AI tools as new creative mediums rather than just prompt-response systems

actionable_quotes.quote: We can really do a lot more when we're using visuals to drive visuals as opposed to semantics to drive visuals
actionable_quotes.actionability: Use image references and visual inputs instead of relying on text descriptions
Focus educational content on giving users practical competency quickly

comment_insights.insight: Users are seeing immediate practical results from the tutorial content
comment_insights.evidence: I watched this video last week and quickly improved my designs, but I watched it again today. OMG, the results I'm getting are outstanding
comment_insights.author: @@BigClout55
comment_insights.relevance: Shows the tutorial provides actionable value that improves user outcomes

comment_insights.insight: Diverse professional applications beyond basic image generation
comment_insights.evidence: I work a lot in Midjourney and make video ads etc. This changes the way I use Midjourney!
comment_insights.author: @@aphotographerspodcast
comment_insights.relevance: Indicates professional video/advertising market segment using these tools

comment_insights.insight: Progressive skill development from basic to advanced creative applications
comment_insights.evidence: I started by creating images for my PowerPoint presentations, then I was creating watch faces, and now I'm creating illustrations for books
comment_insights.author: @@GirlGeekLovesStampin
comment_insights.relevance: Shows natural progression path for users from business to creative applications

comment_insights.insight: UX designers want more intuitive controls for AI image generation
comment_insights.evidence: I'm a ux designer… mid journey should work on adding levers, sliders, etc to help ppl play with the program more
comment_insights.author: @@fiftyseventh
comment_insights.relevance: Identifies product improvement opportunity for more intuitive interfaces

comment_insights.insight: Demand for tutorials on real photo manipulation vs generated images
comment_insights.evidence: why everyone is making videos with cg images? we need a examples of real images like our photos.. so why don't you create a tutorial on that?
comment_insights.author: @@damodharkumar1141
comment_insights.relevance: Shows market gap for photo editing/enhancement tutorials vs pure generation

top_validated_comments.comment: NEW CHARACTER UNLOCKED NICK ST PIERRE AKA MIDJOURNEY GOD. LIKE/COMMENT/SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE OF THIS IN YOUR FEED
top_validated_comments.author: @@GregIsenberg
top_validated_comments.business_value: Host recognizes expert authority, indicating strong personal branding opportunity in AI education space

top_validated_comments.comment: Best damn video on midjourney I've ever seen. Thank you so much
top_validated_comments.author: @@phonejail
top_validated_comments.business_value: Strong positive sentiment indicates high-quality educational content demand in this space

top_validated_comments.comment: why everyone is making videos with cg images? we need a examples of real images like our photos.. so why don't you create a tutorial on that?
top_validated_comments.author: @@damodharkumar1141
top_validated_comments.business_value: Clear market demand for photo editing/enhancement tutorials vs pure AI generation content
